skill_e.tooltip:
Flies to an allied champion, granting them a 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.8) health shield for 3 seconds.

Can be re-cast at no cost once within 5 seconds.

Battle Dance's cast range is increased when cast on Xayah.

skill_q.tooltip:
Flings a magical feather that deals 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.6) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic monster, Rakan restores ? (+0.7) health to himself and nearby allies after 3 seconds or when he touches an ally.

skill_r.tooltip:
Gain 75% movement speed for 4 seconds.

Touching enemies deals 100/200/300 (+0.5) magic damage and charms them for 1/1.25/1.5 second(s) the first time they're hit. The first champion charmed grants Rakan 150% decaying movement speed.

skill_w.tooltip: Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan spirals into the air, dealing ? magic damage and knocking up enemies for ? second.
